__e: I-I don't go around bragging about you, either.
I drive him around all day and then he stiffed me on the tab.
You've got those things running day and night, all over the dang ship, and you are telling me not one of them saw something...
"Once I moved about like the wind.
And just when it gets the worst, when they're sitting there... and their hearts are going like trapped animals out here in the dark, we save them.
Some people roaming around like me.
